title: [Ruins, Lower Platform]
description: Set off to one side of this lower platform, a pair of stone chairs rest on either side of a small table.  Tall, flameless torches glow with an eerie light, casting shadows across the obsidian walkways spiraling upwards to more ruin-dotted platforms.
A pair of stone chairs rest on either side of a small table.  Tall flameless torches glow with an eerie light.  The platforms continue upward, spiraling around the ruins.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, southeast, southwest, west
